item.title: Toll Free Number Includes Conference Calling
item.description: Looking for a budget-friendly way to host toll-free conference calls? Consider using a toll-free number from Kall8. With rates starting at $2 per number and a $2 monthly service fee, plus a per-minute charge of 6.9 cents for incoming calls, it’s a cost-effective solution. You might be surprised to learn that Kall8 includes toll-free conferencing as a standard feature. No complicated setup or scheduling required â€“ it’s ready to use whenever you need it.
